chapters.title: Chapter 1: Fanning the Sparks
chapters.info: Joni Shagrin, p. 53 (40)—Man who will escort Mara, Amaena, and Serenla to Bryne's manor. He is wide-bodied and balding. He was also the man who escorted the three from the shed they were being detained in. When Bryne was still Captain of the Queen's Guards, Joni was Senior Bannerman.
